original: 琅琊臨沂人，魏臣、後仕西晉。為《二十四孝》中臥冰求鯉的主角，以孝德聞名天下。在軍事政要上雖無過人建樹，但因其德行高尚，及至年老，仍深得司馬炎敬重。
text: Langya Linyi people, Wei Chen, post Western Jin Dynasty. He is the protagonist of 'Twenty-Four Filial Piety' and is famous for his filial piety. Although he has no outstanding achievements in military politicians, he is still respected by Sima Yan because of his noble virtue and his old age.
